meanings.definition: A military or political leader in Latin America
meanings.sent1: The caudillos led their troops into battle with great courage.
meanings.sent2: In history books, caudillos are often portrayed as powerful figures.
meanings.sent3: The caudillos decided to have a dance-off to determine who would lead the country.
meanings.sent4: The caudillos' influence over the people was as strong as a raging storm.
meanings.sent5: The image of the caudillos on horseback became iconic in the region.

meanings.definition: Plural form of caudillo, referring to multiple military or political leaders in Latin America
meanings.sent1: The conference was attended by various caudillos from different countries.
meanings.sent2: The caudillos gathered to discuss strategies for the upcoming election.
meanings.sent3: The caudillos organized a friendly soccer match to settle their differences.
meanings.sent4: The unity among the caudillos was a force to be reckoned with.
meanings.sent5: The presence of the caudillos in the room commanded attention and respect.
